 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַעְמָה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַעְמָא‎</span> ([[BDB#Gi|Gi]]<sup>Intr. 124 ff.</sup>) **proper name, masculine** =='son' of Cush==, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָ֯‎</span> [[Gen.10.7|Gen 10:7]] (twice in verse) = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָ֯‎</span> [[1Chr.1.9|1Chr 1:9]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#Baer|Baer]], see his note; [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] [[BDB#Gi|Gi]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָ֯‎</span> v<sup>b</sup>); <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ρεγχμα</span>, <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ρεγμα</span>; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָ֯‎</span> as trading people [[Ezek.27.22|Ezek 27:22]], <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ραμα</span>, <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ραγμα</span>. Identified by many with city <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ῥεγ</span>(<span class="bdbLangGreek">α</span>)<span class="bdbLangGreek">μα</span> ([[BDB#Ptol|Ptol]]<sup>vi. 7, 14</sup>), <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ῥηγμα</span> (Steph. Byz.), in southeast Arabia, on Persian Gulf (so even [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>ZMG xxx (1876), 122</sup> [[BDB#Gl|Glas]]<sup>Skizze ii.251, 325</sup>), but this is <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> in inscription ([[BDB#Gl|Glas]]<sup>ib. 252</sup>); &lt; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רעֿמה‎</span> near ***Me\`în*** in southwest Arabia ([[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Südar. Chr. 131</sup> [[BDB#Hal|Hal]]<sup>535, 11</sup>, compare [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>l.c</sup>.), perhaps = <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ῥαμμανῖται</span> of Strabo<sup>xvi. 4. 24,</sup> see [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>[[Gen.10.7|Gen 10:7]]</sup>.
